text: Munibuke ubwo Shitani yakundishaga (abahakanyi) ibikorwa byabo akababwira ati “Uyu munsi ntawe ubatsinda kandi rwose ndi kumwe namwe.” Nuko ubwo amatsinda yombi yasakiranaga, (Shitani) yarahunze aravuga ati “Mu by'ukuri nitandukanyije namwe, njye ndabona ibyo mutabona, rwose ndatinya Allah. Kandi Allah ni Nyiribihano bikaze.”
